snippet: ADLER--Muriel "Mitzi," passed away on April 10, 2016. Adored wife of the late Harry. Beloved Mother of David (Janis) and Karen (Stephen). Cherished grandmother of Michael, Maddy, Elizabeth and Julia. Graveside services at 11:00am, Wednesday, April 13th, at Mount Ararat Cemetery, Lindenhurst, Long Island, New York. Shiva observed at the home of David and Janis Adler, Chappaqua, New York. A Woman of Valor, who can find? Her worth is far above jewels. Wherever people gather, her deeds speak her praise. 1/3
